summary.Title: Join Our Team as a Dim Sum Chef – Bring the Flavors of Southern China to Copenhagen!

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Join Our Team as a Dim Sum Chef – Bring the Flavors of Southern China to Copenhagen!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about the art of dim sum? Do you take pride in creating authentic Chinese dishes that capture the essence of southern China? Join our well-established restaurant, located in the heart of Copenhagen, where we've been delighting guests with traditional Chinese cuisine since 1999.

About Us

Our mission is to bring a piece of southern China to Denmark. Known for our dedication to authentic flavors, we have become a cornerstone of Copenhagen’s culinary scene, specializing in delicious and meticulously crafted dim sums.

We Are Looking For

A skilled Dim Sum Chef to join our team full-time. You will play a vital role in upholding the quality and authenticity of our dishes, ensuring every guest experiences the true taste of southern China.

What We Offer
  • Full-time position: 37 working hours per week.
  • Competitive salary: 32,500 DKK per month before tax.
  • Generous vacation: 5 weeks of paid holiday annually, in accordance with the Danish Holiday Act.
  • An opportunity to work in a respected restaurant with a strong reputation for authentic Chinese cuisine.
About You
  • You have experience in preparing dim sum and Chinese cuisine.
  • You are passionate about delivering high-quality dishes with attention to detail.
  • You are a team player and thrive in a busy kitchen environment.

If you are ready to bring your culinary skills to a team that values tradition, quality, and authenticity, we would love to hear from you!

How to Apply
Please send your CV and a brief introduction of yourself to info@royalgarden.dk. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.

Become part of our journey to bring a taste of southern China to Copenhagen!
